name: Light Drake Crest
effects: Increase resistance to Fire, Lightning, Wind and Light by 30% for 3 turns to all allies

desc_short: Boost fire, lightning, wind, and light resistance for all allies

desc_long: Boosts fire, lightning, wind, and light resistance for all allies.
提高全體隊員火雷風光屬性耐性的數值。
아군 전체의 불, 번개, 바람, 빛속성 저항력이 상승합니다.
Augmente la résistance au feu, au vent et à la lumière de tous les alliés.
Resist. hoch gegen Feuer, Blitz, Wind und Licht, alle Verb.
Aumenta la resistencia al fuego, rayo, viento y luz de todos los aliados.
